name: Papas Bravas with Vegan Aioli and Salsa
description: These papas bravas with vegan aioli and salsa are the perfect comfort food! They're ready in only 30 minutes and soooo yummy!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups diced tomatoes (drain most of the liquid)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Peel the potatoes and cut them into cubes. Place them in a bowl and toss them with the remaining ingredients for the papas bravas. Place them onto a baking tray and bake for 25 minutes until they're crispy and brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F. Peel the potatoes and cut them into cubes. Place them in a bowl and toss them with the remaining ingredients for the papas bravas. Place them onto a baking tray and bake for 25 minutes until they're crispy and brown.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the salsa and the vegan aioli. For each recipe, combine all the listed ingredients in a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the salsa and the vegan aioli. For each recipe, combine all the listed ingredients in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the papas bravas with the salsa and the aioli and sprinkle fresh parsley, green onions, and red pepper flakes on top. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the papas bravas with the salsa and the aioli and sprinkle fresh parsley, green onions, and red pepper flakes on top. Enjoy!
